CHAT.comment: PGA TOUR, INC., Petitioner, v. CASEY MARTIN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:13 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF H. BARTOW FARR, III ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY L. REARDON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT [*48] OF H. BARTOW FARR, III ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:13 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
